h2.strong: Grab and Go Meals occur every Monday and Wednesday.

ul.li: Mondays, children will receive two (2) breakfast and two (2) lunch meals (a total of 4 meals per child)
Wednesdays, children will receive three (3) breakfast and three (3) lunch meals (a total of 6 meals per child)

li.a: Grab and Go Lunch_ Arabic – Google Docs

p.strong: William Penn High School Loading Dock
p.br:
713 E Basin Rd, New Castle, DE 19720
11:00 am – 12:30 pm

795 Cox Neck Rd, New Castle, DE 19720
11:00 am – 12:30 pm

250 Fifth Street, Delaware City, DE 19706
12:00 – 2:00 pm

26 Karlyn Drive, New Castle, DE 19720
11:30 – 1:00 pm

Times and locations are subject to change. Please allow for 10 minutes of “flex time” between scheduled stops as our staff are making sure every child is accommodated and some stops may take longer than others. We appreciate your patience.

div.p: The Colonial School District shall not discriminate in its employment practices or its educational programs and activities of students on the basis of race, creed, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, sexual orientation, domicile, marital status, disability, genetic information, veteran status, or any legally protected characteristic.
